# weakMemory

**Type Property**

Uses weak read and write barriers appropriate for ARC or GC. Using NSPointerFunctionsWeakMemory object references will turn to `NULL` on last release.

## Declaration

```swift
static var weakMemory: NSPointerFunctions.Options { get }
```

## Memory Options

- **machVirtualMemory**: Use Mach memory.
- **mallocMemory**: Use `free()` on removal, `calloc()` on copy in.
- **opaqueMemory**: Take no action when pointers are deleted.
- **strongMemory**: Use strong write-barriers to backing store; use garbage-collected memory on copy-in.
- **NSMapTableStrongMemory**: Equivalent to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSPointerFunctions/Options/strongMemory].
- **NSMapTableWeakMemory**: Equivalent to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSPointerFunctions/Options/weakMemory].
